frontMatter.title: Area of a rhombus
frontMatter.description: Write a program to compute area of Rhombus

contentHtml:
Write a program to compute the area of a rhombus

Diagonal 1 : 6
Diagonal 2 : 8

Area : 24
markdown:
## Write a program to compute the area of a rhombus

```txt
Diagonal 1 : 6
Diagonal 2 : 8

Area : 24
```

---
